types:type.name: postDB

%dw 2.0
type postDB = Array<{| ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, code: String, FirstName: String, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, origin: String, destination: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, flightType: String, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"ID\\\":123,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"FirstName\\\":\\\"AZ\\\",\\\"price\\\":400,\\\"origin\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"DLH\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":75,\\\"flightType\\\":\\\"Boeing 558\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":150},{\\\"ID\\\":123,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"FirstName\\\":\\\"AZ\\\",\\\"price\\\":400,\\\"origin\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"DLH\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":75,\\\"flightType\\\":\\\"Boeing 558\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":150}]"}
